ARABIC: قَالَ أَوْسَطُهُمْ أَلَمْ أَقُل لَّكُمْ لَوْلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The best of them said, 'Did I not say to you, "Why do you not glorify Allah?'"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: One who was temperate among them, said: "Did I not say: 'Why don't you priase God?'"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The best among them said: “Did I not say to you: why do you not give glory to (your Lord)?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: A reasonable one among them said, "Did I not tell you that you should glorify God?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The best among them said, “Did I not tell you, ‘Why do you not proclaim His purity?’”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The Awsat among them said; "Did I not tell you, `Why do you not Tusabbihun."'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The best of them said: Did I not say to you, Why do you not glorify (Allah)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said the most moderate of them, 'Did I not say to you, "Why do you not give glory?"'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The best among them said: Said I not unto you: Why glorify ye not (Allah)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The more upright of the two said, "Did I not bid you to glorify God?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: The most moderate of them said: said I not Unto you, wherefore hallow him ye not!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The most upright among them said, ‘Did I not tell you, ‘‘Why do you not glorify [Allah]?’’ ’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Said one of them, more just (than the rest): "Did I not say to you, 'Why not glorify (Allah)?'"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The best among them said: "Did I not tell you: why do you not say: Insha' Allah (If Allah will)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (Whereupon) the best among them said: 'Did I not say to you to exalt (Allah)'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The most reasonable of them said, “Did I not say to you, ‘if only you would glorify?’”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The most moderate of them said, "Did I not say to you, 'Why do you not exalt [Allah]?' "
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:28] The most moderate, the best one, among them said, ‘Did I not say to you, “Why do you not glorify?” ’, God, repenting [to Him].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The best among them) in intellect and opinion; and it is also said this means: the older one of them; and it 684 is also said: the most upright among them (said: Said I not unto you: Why glorify ye not (Allah)) why not say: Allah willing? He said this when they made their vow.
